entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
